mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER m INNER JOIN BOX_PERMISSION p ON p.member_id = m.member_id WHERE p.BOX_NO = #{box_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOX_PERMISSION(NO, BOX_NO, MEMBER_ID, MASTER_PER, WRITE_PER, READ_PER, EDIT_PER, DELETE_PER,MEMBER_STAT) VALUES (#{no}, #{box_no}, #{member_id}, #{master_per}, #{write_per}, #{read_per}, #{edit_per}, #{delete_per}, #{member_stat})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOX_PERMISSION SET MASTER_PER = #{master_per}, WRITE_PER = #{write_per}, READ_PER = #{read_per}, EDIT_PER = #{edit_per}, DELETE_PER = #{delete_per}, MEMBER_STAT = #{member_stat} WHERE BOX_NO = #{box_no} AND MEMBER_ID= #{member_id}
